coreQueryPageProvider.name: default_collection
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE dc:title ILIKE ? AND ecm:mixinType = 'Collection' AND ecm:isProxy = 0 AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted'

coreQueryPageProvider.name: default_collection_candidate
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document where dc:title ILIKE ? AND ecm:isProxy = 0 AND ecm:mixinType != 'SystemDocument' AND ecm:mixinType != 'NotCollectionMember' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted'

coreQueryPageProvider.name: default_content_collection
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document where ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND collectionMember:collectionIds/* = ?
